testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/widgets/) Verification for all the page's links #1: {elementKey=Checkout Widget Button, pageURL={url}/products-and-docs/widgets/checkout/, pageTitle=//h1}

children.description: Given open Widgets page
Open page
When check visibility and click {Checkout Widget Button} element of Widgets page
Validate and click element: Checkout Widget Button
Then check that new page opened from Widgets page has {{url}/products-and-docs/widgets/checkout/} and {//h1}
Check if page is opened: {url}/products-and-docs/widgets/checkout/, //h1, http://127.0.0.1:4000
